rooms.description: Open-plan living space with dining area integrated. Features floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and ventilation, ensuring adherence to Vastu principles by promoting east-west alignment.
Modern kitchen with open layout integrated into the living area. Designed for efficient workflow and natural ventilation through large windows positioned according to Vastu recommendations.
Spacious master bedroom featuring a private balcony for relaxation and additional natural light. North-east placement ensures positive energy flow as per Vastu.
Cozy guest bedroom with its own balcony, offering privacy and ample sunlight. South-west orientation enhances the room's harmony with Vastu principles.
Well-designed bathroom ensuring proper ventilation and natural light access. Placed in accordance to Vastu guidelines to avoid negative energy.

openings.description: Large windows installed across all rooms to maximize natural light and ventilation. Placement ensures compliance with Vastu principles of proper energy flow.
Balconies for each bedroom providing outdoor access and enhancing air circulation. Constructed as per Vastu recommendations for privacy and natural light.
Front door positioned to allow easy access from the garden. Placed according to Vastu principles for a welcoming and positive energy entrance.

garden.description: Expansive garden surrounding the bungalow, designed with indigenous plants and water features to promote a natural, tranquil environment in line with Vastu guidelines.

building_norms: Indian residential standards compliant, with attention to local codes and cultural norms.

vastu_alignment.description: Floor plan designed respecting Vastu principles ensuring optimal natural light, ventilation, and energy flow throughout the bungalow.
